Brutal manipulation done by Binance themselves the past few weeks, their moves are actually all visible publicly just by looking at the open interest and the orderbook. 

A lot of people may be wondering why this is happening and why they are making these move and here is the answer:  

There are too many buyers and almost 0 sellers in the market ( This is public info as you can see it directly from the open interest when the price moves ). They are trying to shake people out of the market by liquidating both sides and inducing enough fear for people to stop buying and selling  ( shorting ) instead before the real big move. 

However, this does not mean that the price will pump soon, in my opinion it is as likely that we see a big move down as seeing a move up. The odds are 50/50 at this point because it is up to Binance to decide when to stop these kind of moves. It is just a matter of time and the best thing you can do currently is avoid big leverage until we see a clear "up only" path.

The reality is that we need less buyers and more sellers before we see the big move up which means we need the open interest to go down dramatically and that is ultimately what Binance is trying to achieve here.
